properties.title: Overgrown branches blocking trail clearance
properties.description: Low branches from cottonwoods hanging at 5ft height over 200ft stretch. Hazard for cyclists.

properties.title: Bank erosion along trail near County Line Rd
properties.description: Trail shoulder washed out after recent rain. Exposed gravel and root system along 15ft section. Needs gravel fill and erosion mat.

properties.title: Loose railing on bridge
properties.description: Metal railing on pedestrian bridge is wobbly - two bolts missing from connection plate.

properties.title: Ice buildup at north-facing trail section
properties.description: Shaded section stays icy well into afternoon. 200ft section is treacherous for walkers and cyclists.

properties.title: Illegal dumping at trail access point
properties.description: Someone dumped construction debris (drywall, wood, nails) at the informal trail access. Safety hazard.

properties.title: Snow drift blocking trail at tree line
properties.description: Wind-blown snow drifted 3ft deep across 50ft of trail. Impassable without snowshoes.

properties.title: Cracked asphalt along trail
properties.description: Multiple transverse cracks across 100ft section. Some cracks 1-2 inches wide. Trip hazard for cyclists.

properties.title: Graffiti on trail underpass wall
properties.description: Spray paint tags on both walls of the underpass. Multiple colors, approximately 20ft coverage.

properties.title: Shopping cart abandoned on trail
properties.description: Shopping cart from nearby store left in the middle of the trail. Blocking path.

properties.title: Tagging on park bench and trash can
properties.description: Black and silver paint marker tags on wooden bench and metal trash receptacle.

properties.title: Washout at drainage culvert crossing
properties.description: Culvert overflow carved 2ft deep channel across trail surface. Muddy and impassable after rain events.

properties.title: Black ice at bridge deck
properties.description: Bridge deck freezes before the trail surface. Multiple users reported slipping. Needs sand/salt.

properties.title: Tire and household trash dumped off trail
properties.description: 4 tires and several bags of household garbage dumped 20ft off trail into drainage area.

properties.title: Tree root lifting pavement
properties.description: Large cottonwood root system pushing up trail surface creating 3-inch bump. Bike hazard.

properties.title: Loose gravel on paved trail
properties.description: Gravel washed onto paved surface from adjacent shoulder. Slippery for bikes at the curve.

properties.title: Bench broken - missing slat
properties.description: Park bench is missing one seat slat. Sharp bolt ends exposed. Potential injury.

properties.title: Graffiti on concrete barrier at trailhead
properties.description: Large piece covering 8ft of concrete barrier. Needs pressure washing and sealant.

properties.title: Slope failure above trail
properties.description: Hill above trail slumped 6ft, depositing mud and rocks on trail surface. Partial trail blockage.

properties.title: Drinking fountain not working
properties.description: Fountain at trail rest stop produces no water. Button clicks but nothing comes out.

properties.title: Trail edge crumbling into drainage ditch
properties.description: Soft soil along drainage ditch has collapsed 2ft inward. Trail width reduced from 8ft to 5ft.

properties.title: Dog waste bags left on trail bench
properties.description: Multiple used dog waste bags piled on and around the bench. Not in the trash can 50ft away.

properties.title: Vandalism on trail signage
properties.description: Direction sign defaced with permanent marker. Arrow obscured, hikers getting confused.

properties.title: Missing section of trail edge
properties.description: 4ft x 2ft chunk of asphalt broken away at trail edge. Gravel base exposed.

properties.title: Icy steps at trail access point
properties.description: Concrete steps at the trail connection are sheet ice from dripping overhang. Fall hazard.

properties.title: Runoff channel forming across paved trail
properties.description: Water finds a low spot and runs across the pavement, eroding the base material. Cracking visible.

properties.title: Invasive thistle patch encroaching on trail
properties.description: Dense patch of musk thistle growing within 2ft of trail edge. Spreading rapidly.

properties.title: Packed snow making trail unusable
properties.description: 2 weeks of foot traffic compacted snow into bumpy ice. Needs machine grooming or ice-melt.

properties.title: Exposed rebar in concrete path
properties.description: Concrete path section crumbled revealing 3 pieces of rebar sticking up 2 inches. Injury risk.

properties.title: Large furniture dumped at trailhead
properties.description: Old couch and mattress abandoned at the edge of the trailhead parking lot.

properties.title: Etching on restroom building exterior
properties.description: Scratched and painted graffiti on north and east walls of the restroom facility.

properties.title: Pothole in trailhead parking lot
properties.description: 3ft diameter pothole near the entrance. Depth approximately 4 inches. Collecting water and growing.

properties.title: Standing water on trail after rain
properties.description: Low spot in trail holds water 2 inches deep across full width for 30ft. Poor drainage.

properties.title: Bank erosion along trail near County Line Rd
properties.description: Trail shoulder washed out after recent rain. Exposed gravel and root system along 15ft section. Needs gravel fill and erosion mat.

properties.title: Trail light out
properties.description: LED trail light at the underpass intersection is dark. Creates safety concern at night.

properties.title: Faded parking lot striping
properties.description: Line markings barely visible. Drivers parking at odd angles, reducing capacity by ~20%.

properties.title: Illegal dumping at trail access point
properties.description: Someone dumped construction debris (drywall, wood, nails) at the informal trail access. Safety hazard.

properties.title: Ice buildup at north-facing trail section
properties.description: Shaded section stays icy well into afternoon. 200ft section is treacherous for walkers and cyclists.

properties.title: Blind corner with no mirror or warning
properties.description: Sharp blind corner where multi-use trail meets hill. Head-on collisions between bikes and walkers.

properties.title: Shopping cart abandoned on trail
properties.description: Shopping cart from nearby store left in the middle of the trail. Blocking path.

properties.title: Broken glass on trail surface
properties.description: Shattered bottle across 10ft of trail. Glass fragments mixed into surface. Needs sweeping.

properties.title: Cracked asphalt along trail
properties.description: Multiple transverse cracks across 100ft section. Some cracks 1-2 inches wide. Trip hazard for cyclists.

properties.description: Culvert overflow carved 2ft deep channel across trail surface. Muddy and impassable after rain events.

properties.title: Slope failure above trail
properties.description: Hill above trail slumped 6ft, depositing mud and rocks on trail surface. Partial trail blockage.

properties.title: Dead tree leaning toward trail
properties.description: 20ft dead cottonwood leaning at 30 degrees over the trail. Could fall in next wind event.

properties.title: Tree root lifting pavement
properties.description: Large cottonwood root system pushing up trail surface creating 3-inch bump. Bike hazard.

properties.title: Trash can overflowing - needs larger receptacle
properties.description: 32-gallon can at this popular spot overflows every weekend. Needs upgrade to 55-gallon.

properties.description: Soft soil along drainage ditch has collapsed 2ft inward. Trail width reduced from 8ft to 5ft.

properties.title: Missing grate cover on drainage inlet
properties.description: Metal grate cover is gone from drainage inlet adjacent to trail. 2ft drop. Fall hazard for children.

properties.title: Missing trail mile marker
properties.description: Mile marker post is gone - either vandalized or knocked over. Only mounting hole remains.

properties.title: Missing section of trail edge
properties.description: 4ft x 2ft chunk of asphalt broken away at trail edge. Gravel base exposed.

properties.title: Etching on restroom building exterior
properties.description: Scratched and painted graffiti on north and east walls of the restroom facility.

properties.title: Cracking and heaving in parking surface
properties.description: Frost heave created 3-inch lip across two lanes. Trip hazard for pedestrians.

properties.title: Faded trail map at kiosk
properties.description: UV damage has made the trail map nearly unreadable. Colors washed out, text illegible.

properties.title: Graffiti on trail underpass wall
properties.description: Spray paint tags on both walls of the underpass. Multiple colors, approximately 20ft coverage.

properties.title: Black ice at bridge deck
properties.description: Bridge deck freezes before the trail surface. Multiple users reported slipping. Needs sand/salt.

properties.description: Hill above trail slumped 6ft, depositing mud and rocks on trail surface. Partial trail blockage.

properties.title: Vegetation obscuring trail signage
properties.description: Shrub growth has completely hidden the trail junction sign. Users missing the turn.

properties.title: Noxious weed infestation in open space
properties.description: Large patch of knapweed spreading through native grass area. Needs treatment before seeding.

properties.title: Trail edge crumbling into drainage ditch
properties.description: Soft soil along drainage ditch has collapsed 2ft inward. Trail width reduced from 8ft to 5ft.

properties.title: Wasp nest in trail sign post
properties.description: Active paper wasp nest inside the hollow trail sign post. Users getting stung.

properties.title: Dog waste bags left on trail bench
properties.description: Multiple used dog waste bags piled on and around the bench. Not in the trash can 50ft away.

properties.title: Wrong direction on arrow sign
properties.description: Trail junction sign arrow points wrong way after maintenance. Users going off-trail.

properties.title: Large furniture dumped at trailhead
properties.description: Old couch and mattress abandoned at the edge of the trailhead parking lot.
